author: hlship
msg: Specify the service id of the default HTMLDescriber (to prevent conflicts with the portlet-specific one).

author: hlship
msg: Allow objects described inside a portlet to make use of the defined Portlet CSS styles.
Add a describable adapter for PortletSession.
Only generate a Form name during true render (when it is legal to obtain the portlet namespace).

author: hlship
msg: Change the form component to use a fixed parameter name, 'formids', rather than the form's name, to track allocated and reserved element ids.

author: hlship
msg: Factor out much of the behavior of the Body component as a new interface (PageRenderSupport) and implementation, so that it can be reused seperately.
